website_summaries.verdict: Prep for your project with a 3-pack of portable band saw blades.
pros: Matrix II High Speed steel edge for heat and wear resistance, with 8% cobalt content for added durability & wear
Also, tooth hardness rating is high for better wear
Alloy steel backer for fatigue resistance
Ideal for thick, medium, and thin gauge metal cutting
cons: This product received overwhelming positive reviews from purchasers, a very few complaints about the blades breaking easily, and not being able to cut through stainless steel

customer_reviews.title: Makita compatible blades
customer_reviews.text: They fit my portable Makita bandsaw just fine. Hold up as well as expected with proper use and care. I cut anything from angle iron, square tube, solid round stock to all thread & bolts. I'll purchase again when in need.
customer_reviews.author: Big_D

customer_reviews.title: Ehh. Weak QC
customer_reviews.text: Not very happy with the quality of the blades I’ve been receiving. In the Last couple months I’ve bought probably 12 blades and most have been cracked at welds from factory and all break very quick. Good thing they’re cheap but still having to buy more makes me wonder if it’s worth the price?
customer_reviews.author: chase

customer_reviews.title: Good tools, poor quality blades
customer_reviews.text: Let me start by saying I have a garage full of DeWalt tools, and I like all of them. These blades however are a different story. For starters 1 blade was broken at the weld when I opened the box. Then the second blade broke at the weld after about 20 minutes of cutting. I'm now on my 3rd blade, hopefully it at least lasts long enough to finish the project I need to get done.
customer_reviews.author: Tanner

customer_reviews.title: Rob
customer_reviews.text: The band is weak at the seam not an unusual problem for fine tooth cutting. The 18 tooth would be a better choice for alum or light steel. Bands with 24 teeth hold up well to stainless steel cutting. NOTE when ordering for a cordless saw make sure to order the DW3984C 24 "C " indicates cordless.
customer_reviews.author: rob

customer_reviews.title: 24 tpi hard to find in this size
customer_reviews.text: Looked for these awhile could only find 14/18 tpi for my dewalt cordless band saw the little one not the deep cut. Cant decide if I like these or the 14/18 ones better for emt. 14/18 seems a little quicker I'll see how long one lasts compared to the other. It's what it says it is at least
customer_reviews.author: Matthew G.

customer_reviews.title: Not very good for metal.
customer_reviews.text: These are definitely not the same blade that came on the saw. Much lower quality. Blades completely dull after only a few metal cuts. The original blade lasted about 10x longer than these.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Graham

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what the longevity of these blades are supposed to be seems there's not another product to compare them to.
customer_reviews.author: Kid Sparkles

customer_reviews.title: First one lasted much longer than expected before the band ...
customer_reviews.text: First one lasted much longer than expected before the band snapped. Second one dulled faster than expected, but I am cutting steel of medium hardness and I am not gentle with it.
customer_reviews.author: T. Mark Graham

customer_reviews.title: fits Dewalt 20volt bandsaw
customer_reviews.text: Product fit my 20 volt portable band saw, that I had broke the original. The original didn't last long, I hope this one longer
customer_reviews.author: C. W.

customer_reviews.title: blades will be fine for Dewalt tool but alas not Makita
customer_reviews.text: was directed to this product as substitute for Makita blade . item will not work in my Makita tool . worked with Makita rep and putting a Makita brand blade worked on tool . blades will be fine for Dewalt tool but alas not Makita ...
customer_reviews.author: Rich T.

customer_reviews.title: same as $ 7 dollar for 3 ,they are not extra durable
customer_reviews.text: same blades as standard,just a rippoff at four times as much
customer_reviews.author: Roy T.

customer_reviews.title: Dont last as long as expected.
customer_reviews.text: It's a good bandsaw blade. Durability as far as quality dont expect it to last so long. I've had all 3 blades on my bandsaw a month and that's about what they last. Blades start to crack and break before the teeth even fall off. Good clean cuts but dont last long.
customer_reviews.author: Lv growing

customer_reviews.title: they break easily where is the joint
customer_reviews.text: when open the box , one broke in that instant, they break easily where is the joint.
customer_reviews.author: abel

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality. Pretty sure they are knock offs.
customer_reviews.text: Pack comes with 3 blades. One came broken right out of the package. And then another broke on the first cut. You can tell right away that these are sub par quality compared to real Dewalt blades.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: TPI is very important in the use of these blades
customer_reviews.text: I'm a plumber, I use my bandsaw on various metals, Steal, copper, aluminum. I find that 24 TPI cuts faster.
customer_reviews.author: Odell T.

customer_reviews.title: Genuine product!
customer_reviews.text: Genuine DeWalt blade at an exceptional price. This was delivered under the estimated time at checkout. Im happy, content, and will buy again from this seller. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Dee lee

customer_reviews.title: For quality you can't go wrong with dewalt
customer_reviews.text: We are dedicated dewalt customers because of the quality of their products and these blades of course met our expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: great blades at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Awesome blades at a great price. Been averaging a month of use per blade. I use them for cutting conduit, strut, all thread, and even let someone borrow it to cut the aluminum framework for commercial bathroom stalls
customer_reviews.author: Erik Dahlquist

customer_reviews.title: Stout owners
customer_reviews.text: I own a stout cordless bandsaw and these blades are an exact match and cheaper. They are made in Belarus the same place that stout are made so I believe they are made by the same company just different packaging. I had to make a special trip to a supplier but this also saves the gas money A+A+A+A+
customer_reviews.author: P.M.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Band-Saw Blades
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to my battery band-saw. Blades are an addition to my existing workshop. Wonderful Band-Saw Blades
customer_reviews.author: RAH Construction Consulting LLC

customer_reviews.title: Cheap price, high quality
customer_reviews.text: Does what it's supposed to do, great for emt and strut. Get a couple months out of each blade. Last one never broke, changed due to teeth dulling after 5 months. That's a first for me
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: 24tpi much better for pipe and unistrut than the 18tpi counterpart
customer_reviews.text: Works for dewalt and stout bandsaw. 24tpi much better for pipe and unistrut than the 18tpi counterpart. I usually get a month per blade, which amounts to hundreds of cuts
customer_reviews.author: Kurt

customer_reviews.title: My tools
customer_reviews.text: It works great on one of my most favorite tools my portable bandsaw
customer_reviews.author: andre

customer_reviews.title: cannot trust
customer_reviews.text: got my blades. nothing wrong with them except for one of the 3 boxes i got, appeared to arrive empty. no blades. nice job, amazon!
customer_reviews.author: the best game ever

customer_reviews.title: Great Dewalt saw blades.
customer_reviews.text: I use these in the electrical trades cutting conduit, strut supports and all thread and have been very pleased with them.
customer_reviews.author: Parrotheadjoe

customer_reviews.title: what i use
customer_reviews.text: these blades are awesome there is 3 blades in the package I'm an electrician and use my bandsaw everyday one blade last me a month at a time
customer_reviews.author: lea popa

customer_reviews.title: They don't last.
customer_reviews.text: I have seen band saw blades last a month. I went through 3 Dewalt blades in five days. I won't buy Dewalt again.
customer_reviews.author: Dissappointed.

customer_reviews.title: Great price on great blades....
customer_reviews.text: fantastic price for the blades. Work as one would expect.
customer_reviews.author: Leterbuck

customer_reviews.title: 3 pack
customer_reviews.text: This is a great deal for your portable cordless dewalt bandsaw. Also with free shipping made it better. Its always good to have spare blades around.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: worked great on the metal fence posts we had to trim down after cementing them in the ground.
customer_reviews.author: EC

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Pack of 3 with good price and delivered on time
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: INDUBITABLY!!!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed, fast delivery! Will buy from again!
customer_reviews.author: danielsan

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: IT'S THE CORRECT BLADES I NEEDED. FOR SOME REASON I CAN'T THEM AT HOME DEPOT.
customer_reviews.author: KEVIN

customer_reviews.title: Exact factory replacement part.
customer_reviews.text: Exact replacement blades. Great price and exactly what I was looking for. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in good condition & working great on my portable band saw.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Newton

customer_reviews.title: The blades worked for me just fine. They cut through emt pretty easy and leave ...
customer_reviews.text: The blades worked for me just fine. They cut through emt pretty easy and leave a nice cut. The life on any of these cordless blades are a lot less then a corded bandsaws blade though.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these blades because of the value and quality
customer_reviews.author: jerp

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These last much longer than the cheap brand I was buying before.
customer_reviews.author: Marlon McHenry

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Always a good buy. Do commercial electrical work 1 blade last about a month.
customer_reviews.author: Geno

customer_reviews.title: Saw Blades
customer_reviews.text: What can I say....it saw blades and they cut good
customer_reviews.author: Tommy

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Once you use a bandsaw you can't go back, this blades are good quality, as any product they will last depending of use
customer_reviews.author: Marco E. Marquez

customer_reviews.title: perfect 90 degree cuts
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight power last all day cuting pipe.perfect 90 degree cuts.faster.lighter than Sawzall.easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: kalvin adams

customer_reviews.title: Great blades
customer_reviews.text: As an electrician, these blades are great for cutting everything i handle. I usually get a good month out of them with heavy use.
customer_reviews.author: Richard S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great blades.. I cut everything from strut to rigid to 1/4" angle.. I'll continue to buy them..
customer_reviews.author: David Yates Sailsbury

customer_reviews.title: very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Been using these in the electrical field for years, very nice!
customer_reviews.author: Thadrick B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Does a good swift cut on square tubing and angle iron.
customer_reviews.author: V. J.

customer_reviews.title: DeWalt band saw blades
customer_reviews.text: Love my new 18v cordless band saw - gets the job done, blades hold up well, fits right in with all my other DeWalt 18v tools
customer_reviews.author: Ian V Adkins

customer_reviews.title: What can I say...
customer_reviews.text: It's a bandsaw blade. It does what it is supposed to do. Blades last a long time as long as a dummy doesn't operate the tool.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Gotta have em
customer_reviews.text: I have to have extra blades . The saw is useless without a blade . I am still using the blade the saw came with but I keep extras just in case .
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Did not fit to short for my Milwaukee I could ...
customer_reviews.text: Did not fit to short for my Milwaukee I could not use them and can't find any body that has one they fit

customer_reviews.title: blades
customer_reviews.text: They cut. Not much else to say. Put them on and pull the trigger. Watch it cut what youre cutting
customer_reviews.author: pumpkin

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Don't but these just because it says to, they are the wrong size
customer_reviews.author: Kasper

customer_reviews.title: these blades are junk. wear and tear easily
customer_reviews.text: I recently brought a 3 pack Band Saw Blade for my Portable band saw. After a few cuts the blade snaps. The material I was cutting was 1/2 emt pipes. The material before that was 2'' emt pipe. It snap after a couple of cuts. Maybe the blades are to thin?
customer_reviews.author: Michael Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: I love it  so much that will get one more soon
customer_reviews.text: I like this tool make my get my job done fast and profecional I will keep ordering more blades in the future

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Can't cut stainless steel I want a blade that can cut stainless steel materials

customer_reviews.title: They may work fine in a DeWalt mini-bandsaw but as far as the ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my Makita mini-bandsaw. I have had no luck getting these not to run off of the wheels. I don't have a problem with the Makita blades staying on. They are the same length as the Makita blades. They may work fine in a DeWalt mini-bandsaw but as far as the Makita I would not try them again.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Bickford

customer_reviews.title: They need to be made like the electric portaband blades are these are made very ...
customer_reviews.text: They need to be made like the electric portaband blades are these are made very cheaply. And you need to make a 32t blade
customer_reviews.author: brianbrandon

product_meta.title: DEWALT Portable Band Saw Blade, 32-7/8-Inch, .020-Inch, 24 TPI, 3-Pack (DW3984C)
product_meta.description:
Color:Basic packFROM THE MANUFACTURER
DEWALT Bi-Metal portable bandsaw blades incorporate the Matrix II High Speed Steel Edge for heat and wear resistance. These blades have an 8% cobalt content for added durability and wear. Rc 65-67 tooth hardness also increases wear resistance. The have an alloy steel backer for fatigue resistance. Applications include thick metal, medium metal and thin gauge metal cutting. Package of 3 32-7/8-Inch blades.
feature_bullets: Matrix II High Speed Steel Edge for Heat and Wear Resistance
8% Cobalt Content For Added Durability & Wear. Alloy Steel Backer for Fatigue Resistance
Rc 65-67 Tooth Hardness For Increased Wear Resistance
Cordless bandsaw blades are ideal for thick metal, medium metal, and thin gauge metal cutting

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars478 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
